function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?

loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'row<=LIMIT' be skipped entirely?

dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'row<=LIMIT' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Is variable 'arr (line 5)' used after its definition?

liveness: Does variable 'col' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
Does variable 'arr' remain in use at the end of function 'main'?
dead_code: Is the statement 'arr[row][col] = arr[row-1][col-1] + arr[row-1][col];' unreachable?
